## NFTDrop.getMetadata() method

Get the metadata for this program.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMetadata(): Promise<NFTMetadata>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;NFTMetadata&gt;

program metadata

## Example

```jsx
const metadata = await program.getMetadata();
console.log(metadata.name);
```
